eligibility.notes: 7-11 COD; opened ~18h after pickup; Order is not yet completed

snadResult.label: SNAD
snadResult.reason: The buyer reports a significant difference in color between the seller’s photos and the actual hoodie. The seller’s photos were taken in bright, natural lighting, which caused the color to be darker than expected. This represents a material mismatch, as the color difference is not due to a simple variation in the product.

primaryOption.label: Return & Full Refund
primaryOption.details: Seller reimburses NT$60 COD shipping and provides a return label.

alternativeOption.label: Partial Refund & Keep Item
alternativeOption.details: Buyer keeps the item; offer 15–30% partial refund.

caseSummary:
Order: TW-15011
Eligibility: R1/R2/R3 ✅
Key: The buyer reports a significant difference in color between the seller’s photos and the actual hoodie. The seller’s photos were taken in bright, natural lighting, which caused the color to be darker than expected. This represents a material mismatch, as the color difference is not due to a simple variation in the product.
Decision: SNAD
Outcome: The system approved the return request.
